wikipedia_page.main: Mary Ann Yates Corkling aka May Yates (18 May 1850 – 30 May 1938) was an English painter, who became a food reformer. She spread news of the claimed health benefits for wholemeal bread and became a vegetarian out of her regard for other animals.

response: * Mary Corkling, artist and food reformer, was born at Withington, Manchester, in 1850.
